casebody.data:
James BURKE, Appellant,
v.
ORANGE COUNTY MOTORSPORTS, LLC, d/b/a Jumbo Auto & Truck Plaza of Fort Pierce; American Import Car Sales, Inc., d/b/a Hollywood Kia; Kurkin Forehand Brandes, LLP, Marc Brandes, Esq. and Craig Blinderman, Esq., Appellees. DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
